content.en: Radiation therapy optimization: Scientists are exploring the use of algorithms, specifically deep learning and convolutional neural networks, to improve the accuracy and efficiency of radiation therapy dose calculations. These algorithms are being tested to predict dose distributions, transform dose distributions between different spatial resolutions, and even automate treatment planning strategies. The goal is to enhance the precision and speed of radiotherapy treatments, ultimately improving patient outcomes.
content.da: Optimering af stråleterapi: Forskere undersøger brugen af algoritmer, specifikt dyb læring og konvolutionelle neurale netværk, for at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af stråleterapi-dosisberegninger. Disse algoritmer testes for at forudsige doseringsfordelinger, transformere doseringsfordelinger mellem forskellige rumlige opløsninger og endda automatisere behandlingsplanlægningsstrategier. Målet er at forbedre præcisionen og hastigheden af stråleterapibehandlinger og dermed forbedre patientresultaterne.
